Photos of the IMF — The IMF at Work
(Continued)

These photographs are in the public domain. They are free to use for publication purposes.

1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5

Enlarge this image		 Lei Lei Myaing, a Senior Research Officer of the IMF Institute, assists a visiting official participating in an IMF training course. The IMF Institute offers courses in economic analysis and policy for officials of member countries.
1996

Enlarge this image		 Former Fiscal Affairs Director Teresa Ter-Minassian (center) reviews the work of a technical assistance mission with team members George Tsibouris and Elena Frolia.
June 27, 2002
